text: Anplex of America also known as Aniplex USA is the U.S. distribution enterprise of Aniplex, an anime and music production company owned by Sony Music Entertainment Japan. It was established in Santa Monica, California, with the goal of Aniplex+ store, and also Aniplex Channel, a operated streaming service. Category:Anime companies Category:Companies based in Santa Monica, California
title: Aniplex of America
